text: The Impossible () is a 2012 English-language Spanish disaster drama movie directed by J. A. Bayona and written by Sergio G. Sánchez. It is based on the experience of María Belón and her family in the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami. The cast includes Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor and Tom Holland. The film had positive reviews from critics for its direction and its acting. Watts was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress, the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress – Motion Picture Drama, and a Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Female Actor in a Leading Role. ==References== Category:2012 drama movies Category:2010s historical movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:2010s American drama movies Category:Thai movies Category:Movies directed by J. A. Bayona Category:Movies set in Thailand Category:Movies about tsunamis Category:Movies about death Category:Movies about families Category:Movies about vacationing
title: The Impossible (2012 movie)
